1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Host Dan Walker guides the first five contestants as they take part in the debut edition of the strategic game show.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Five more contestants take part in the strategic game show, hoping to win the five thousand pound top prize hidden in one of the cases that they have been allocated.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: 5 more contestants are each given a case containing a cash amount, they cannot look inside their own case but correctly answering questions can give them the chance to discover what their opponents have.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: 5 contestants answer questions to earn information about what is in their opponents case. Then in the endgame they must decide whether to stick with what they have got or challenge another player.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: 5 players have each been given a case containing a cash amount. They can gain information on the other players cases by answering questions. They then must decide what to do with that knowledge in the endgame.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Dan Walker hosts another edition of the daytime game show in which players answer questions to get the chance to discover what cash amount their opponents have hidden in their cases.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Dan Walker presents the game show in which five contestants each start with a case containing a secret amount of cash. Can they discover who has the top prize of five thousand pounds?

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Daytime game show in which five contestants challenge each other for possession of the case that contains the highest amount of prize money answering questions to learn what their opponents have in their case. Hosted by Dan Walker.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Dan Walker hosts another edition of the strategy based game show in which five contestants are each given a case containing a cash amount but don't know how much it is.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Dan Walker hosts the game show in which contestants answer questions to learn which cash amount is in their opponents cases but cannot see what is inside their own case.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: A journalist from Glasgow, a languages student from Solihull and a caterer from Worcestershire are among the contestants today in the game show hosted by Dan Walker.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: A sporty student and a helicopter pilot are among the contestants taking part in this edition of the strategic game show. Hosted by Dan Walker.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: A paralegal, a civil servant and an administrator are among the five contestants playing the strategic game today. Each are given a case containing a cash value and they must work out who has what amount.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Dan Walker hosts another edition of the game show. Five more contestants are handed a case containing an unknown cash value, can they chase the case containing the top prize?

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Dan Walker hosts the game show in which contestants answer questions to gain knowledge of the contents of their opponents cases.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Five more contestants take part in the strategic game show, hoping to win the five thousand pound top prize hidden in one of the cases that they have been allocated.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: 5 contestants are each given a case containing a cash amount, they cannot look inside their own case but correctly answering questions can give them the chance to discover what their opponents have.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: 5 contestants answer questions to earn information about what is in their opponents case. Then in the endgame they must decide whether to stick with what they have got or challenge another player.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Dan Walker hosts another edition of the daytime game show in which players answer questions to get the chance to discover what cash amount their opponents have hidden in their cases.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: Dan Walker presents the final edition of the first series of the strategic game show in which the players chase the case containing the five thousand pound top prize.

imdb.plot outline: Each of the five contestants taking part in this game show is given a brightly coloured case which contains one of five cash amounts ranging from zero to the five thousand pound top prize. They will answer questions to win the right to take their case with them into a soundproof room where they can choose to either take a peek inside the case of one of their rivals or ask host Dan Walker if the amount contained in one of the other cases is more or less than the amount in their own case - but they cannot look into their own case to see what amount it contains. Successful players then progress to the endgame where, based on the information they have gathered they can choose to either keep hold of their own case or challenge another player for theirs. One winning player will get to open one case and keep the prize money inside.
imdb.title: Chase the Case
plot: A daily, daytime game show in which five contestants swap general knowledge for information to gain access to a case containing a secret stash of cash. Hosted by 'Dan Walker' (qv).::Mark_a_Wood <markawood@hotmail.co.uk>

Each of the five contestants taking part in this game show is given a brightly coloured case which contains one of five cash amounts ranging from zero to the five thousand pound top prize. They will answer questions to win the right to take their case with them into a soundproof room where they can choose to either take a peek inside the case of one of their rivals or ask host 'Dan Walker' (qv) if the amount contained in one of the other cases is more or less than the amount in their own case - but they cannot look into their own case to see what amount it contains. Successful players then progress to the endgame where, based on the information they have gathered they can choose to either keep hold of their own case or challenge another player for theirs. One winning player will get to open one case and keep the prize money inside.::Mark_a_Wood <markawood@hotmail.co.uk>
